alert.note: Alert for Holt (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 19 at 1:30AM CDT by NWS NorthPlatte
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southeastern Holt County through 200 AM CDT... At 128 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 9 miles northeast of O`neill to 6 miles east of Chambers. Movement was east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Ewing, Page and Inman. This includes the following highways... Highway 20 between mile markers 312 and 328. Highway 281 between mile markers 164 and 167. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
